module_serial.label: Module Serial
module_serial.comment: Module serial key linked to your server IP address. Note that it is necessary to fill your IP address on http://www.j2t-design.net. If serial value is wrong, configuration can't be saved.

key.label: Key
key.comment: This is the module serial key linked to your server IP address. This information is available on your user account page on http://www.j2t-design.net.

default.label: Defaults
default.comment:
<script type="text/javascript">
                                //rewardpoints_default_auto_use
                                //rewardpoints_default_step_apply
                                //rewardpoints_default_step_value
                                //rewardpoints_default_full_use
                                
                                checkAllowDirectUsage = function () {
                                    if ($('rewardpoints_default_remove_discount').getValue() == 1){
                                        var options = $$('select#rewardpoints_default_allow_direct_usage option');
                                        var len = options.length;
                                        for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {
                                            if(options[i].value == 0){
                                                options[i].selected = true;
                                            }
                                        }
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_allow_direct_usage').up(1).hide();
                                    } else {
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_allow_direct_usage').up(1).show();
                                    }
                                }
                        
                                checkAutoUse = function(){                
                                    /*if ($('rewardpoints_default_step_multiplier').getValue() == 1){
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_apply').up(1).hide();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_value').up(1).hide();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_full_use').up(1).hide();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_slide').up(1).hide();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_multiplier').up(1).hide();
                                    } else*/ if ($('rewardpoints_default_auto_use').getValue() == 1){
                                        var options = $$('select#rewardpoints_default_step_apply option');
                                        var len = options.length;
                                        for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {
                                            if(options[i].value == 0){
                                                options[i].selected = true;
                                            }
                                        }

                                        var options = $$('select#rewardpoints_default_step_slide option');
                                        var len = options.length;
                                        for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {
                                            if(options[i].value == 0){
                                                options[i].selected = true;
                                            }
                                        }


                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_apply').up(1).hide();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_value').up(1).hide();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_full_use').up(1).hide();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_slide').up(1).hide();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_multiplier').up(1).hide();
                                    } else {
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_apply').up(1).show();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_value').up(1).show();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_full_use').up(1).show();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_slide').up(1).show();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_multiplier').up(1).show();
                                        checkStepUse();
                                    }
                                };

                                checkStepUse = function(){
                                    if ($('rewardpoints_default_step_apply').getValue() == 1){
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_value').up(1).show();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_slide').up(1).show();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_multiplier').up(1).show();
                                    } else {
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_value').up(1).hide();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_slide').up(1).hide();
                                        $('rewardpoints_default_step_multiplier').up(1).hide();
                                    }
                                };
                                
                                
                                
                                checkImg = function(){                                    
                                    if ($('rewardpoints_design_small_inline_image_show').getValue() == 1){
                                        $('rewardpoints_design_small_inline_image').up(1).show();
                                    } else {
                                        $('rewardpoints_design_small_inline_image').up(1).hide();
                                    }
                                    
                                    if ($('rewardpoints_design_big_inline_image_show').getValue() == 1){
                                        $('rewardpoints_design_big_inline_image').up(1).show();
                                    } else {
                                        $('rewardpoints_design_big_inline_image').up(1).hide();
                                    }
                                };
                                

                                Event.observe(window, 'load', function() {
                                    Event.observe('rewardpoints_default_auto_use', 'change', checkAutoUse);
                                    Event.observe('rewardpoints_default_step_apply', 'change', checkStepUse);
                                    
                                    Event.observe('rewardpoints_design_small_inline_image_show', 'change', checkImg);
                                    Event.observe('rewardpoints_design_big_inline_image_show', 'change', checkImg);
                        
                                    Event.observe('rewardpoints_default_remove_discount', 'change', checkAllowDirectUsage);
                                    
                                    checkAllowDirectUsage();
                                    checkAutoUse();
                                    checkStepUse();
                                    checkImg();
                                });


                                

                            </script>

active.label: Active
active.comment: Set to yes in order to activate the module.

process_restriction.label: Attribute restriction
process_restriction.comment: Only process points when reward_points attribute is filled (reward_points attribute needs to be created and must containt integer).

process_tax.label: Include Tax
process_tax.comment: Include tax in reward point discounts (only when customer tax applied before discount in customer tax tab).

process_shipping.label: Include shipping
process_shipping.comment: Include shipping price in discount (only for magento 1.4.x or greater).

process_rate.label: Process currency rate
process_rate.comment: Use currency exchange rate while calculating points & discount (default magento base currency is used).

money_points.label: Points gathered / unit of money spent
money_points.comment: Points gathered for 1 unit of money spent. (e.g. if set to 2, you will obtain 100 points for $50 spent).

min_point_collect.label: Min. Cart Point Collection
min_point_collect.comment: Minimum point value in order to start point collection (use 0 for no minimum point value). This feature is not compatible with "show details".

gather_step.label: Gather Step Value
gather_step.comment: Point gathering step value in cart (0 for no step value). E.g.: if 10, your customer will collect points by steps (10, 20, 30, etc.). This feature is not compatible with "show details".

exclude_groups.label: Exclude Groups
exclude_groups.comment: Exclude groups from being able to see and use reward points features on front-end.

points_money.label: Points to obtain 1 unit of money
points_money.comment: Amount of points required to obtain a discount. Use 0 to forbid point usage.

points_delay.label: Points availability delay
points_delay.comment: Delaying the points availability (use 0 for no-delay).

points_duration.label: Points validity duration
points_duration.comment: Points validity duration in days (use 0 for unlimited).

start_date.label: Date Restriction
start_date.comment: Date used to verify point insertion. Any order date prior this value will no be treated. Leave blank for no restrictions.

min_use.label: Minimum points balance to apply
min_use.comment: The minimum amount of points a customer must have to be able to use at checkout (use 0 for no-limit).

max_point_collect_order.label: Maximum points collected per order
max_point_collect_order.comment: Maximum points to be collected per order (use 0 for unlimited).

max_point_used_order.label: Maximum points used per order
max_point_used_order.comment: Maximum points to be used per order (use 0 for unlimited).

max_point_percent_order.label: Percent usage per order
max_point_percent_order.comment: Order total amount percent value of maximum point usage (e.g. for a total cart amount of $400, if this value is set to 50, maximum point discount will not be higher than $200).

auto_use.label: Automatic use of points
auto_use.comment: Use maximum amount of point while in shopping cart.

step_apply.label: Apply points by step
step_apply.comment: Apply credit points step by step. e.g. 250, 500, 750, etc.

step_multiplier.label: Step multiplier
step_multiplier.comment: Multiplier for the step value. e.g. if the multiplier is 10 and step value 20, the steps will be: 20, 200, 2000, etc. Default value is 1.

full_use.label: Use max amount of points
full_use.comment: Apply the maximum amount of point to the order

math_method.label: Math method
math_method.comment: Math method applied to point calculation. (For exact point value, round up method might be used when necessary.)

coupon_codes.label: Coupon codes restriction
coupon_codes.comment: If yes, customers will not be able to use coupon codes and reward points at the same time within an order.

disable_points_coupon.label: Disable points on coupon usage
disable_points_coupon.comment: Disable point gathering when coupon code is used by the customer.

store_scope.label: Apply store scope
store_scope.comment: If yes, the points collected will be available only for the store where the points were earned.

status_used.label: Validity status field
status_used.comment: Only for magento 1.4.x or greater. Order status database field used when checking points validity (modify this only if you know what you are doing).

valid_statuses.label: Valid gathering statuses
valid_statuses.comment: Order statuses used to validate points (modify this only if you know what you are doing).

valid_used_statuses.label: Valid usage statuses
valid_used_statuses.comment: Order statuses used to validate used points (modify this only if you know what you are doing).

onepage_summary.label: Show onepage checkout summary
onepage_summary.comment: Show summary of point usage within onepage checkout review (compatible with magento 1.4.x or greater).

remove_link.label: Show remove link
remove_link.comment: Show link from cart totals area.

point_equivalence.label: Show money point equivalence
point_equivalence.comment: Show to the customer point value in unit of money as well as amout of points.

allow_recalculate.label: Always recalculate
allow_recalculate.comment: Always recalculate points when order is modified. Note that points allocated to an order may vary according to rules and points configuration.

allow_recalculate_referral.label: Always recalculate referral
allow_recalculate_referral.comment: Always recalculate referral points when order is modified. Note that points allocated to an order may vary according to rules, points configuration and referral program configuration.

remove_discount.label: Remove discounts
remove_discount.comment: Remove discount value to point collection.

allow_direct_usage.label: Allow Direct Usage
allow_direct_usage.comment: Allow customers to directly use points on same order (e.g. if a customer is collecting 100 points on his order, currently collected points can be directly used).

cron_remove.label: Remove cancelled orders
cron_remove.comment: Remove points linked to cancel orders - automated task (Magento cron needs to be active).

show_login.label: Show Log In
show_login.comment: Show Log In url on cart review page, within reward point area.

show_details.label: Show Details
show_details.comment: Show point gathering details on cart review page, within reward point area.

show_customer_summary.label: Show Top Points
show_customer_summary.comment: Show customer points next to my account (works with default top.links theme).

bundle_rule_child.label: Bundle Children Rule Action
bundle_rule_child.comment: If set to yes, rules are applied also on children items of bundle products. In order to avoid double rule processing on bundle products, it is advised to set this value to no.

force_store.label: Force Store Id On Admin Customer Insertion
force_store.comment: By default, when customer is created through admin, admin store id is used. However, when using store scope or notification system, it is required to retrieve correct store information from customer. When set to yes, store id will be stored when creating customer through admin.

custom_point.label: Custom point values
custom_point.comment: Custom point values according to customer groups and dates.

custom_point_value.label: Custom point worthing values
custom_point_value.comment: Setup custom point worthing values according to cart min/max values (use 0 for no min or max value), groups and date range (date is optional value). Value is point value that will worth 1 unit of money (e.g. if set to 2, $100 spent will give 200 points - 100 x 2 - if unit of money is '$'). Important: if always recalculate is set to yes, make sure that the above rules are still available when updating an order.

custom_point_usage.label: Custom point usage values
custom_point_usage.comment: Setup custom point usage values according to cart min/max values (use 0 for no min or max value), groups and date range (date is optional value). Value is the point required in order to get 1 unit of money discount (e.g. if set to 100, 200 points will give $2 discount - 200 / 100 - if unit of money is '$'). Important: if always recalculate is set to yes, make sure that the above rules are still available when updating an order.

first_order.label: First Order Action
first_order.comment: First Order action allow to add points on first's client order.

point_qty.label: Point Qty
point_qty.comment: Point Qty to be given for first valid client's order (0 will void any actions).

min_order.label: Min. Order
min_order.comment: Minimum order amount (base subtotal amount without shipping fees) in order to process first order action (0 for no minimum amount).

from_customer_id.label: From Customer Id
from_customer_id.comment: Start processing first order point from specific user id.

registration.label: Registration/Referral points
registration.comment: Note that guest orders do not allow referral points to be collected.

registration_points.label: Registration points
registration_points.comment: Points earned upon customer registration (points are allocated when customer logs into the system for the first time).

show_registration_points.label: Show registration point sentence (account creation)
show_registration_points.comment: If set to yes, registration point sentence is shown on top of account creation form (detault magento theme).

registration_points_customer_id.label: From customer id
registration_points_customer_id.comment: Start processing registration point from specific user id.

referral_show.label: Show referral link
referral_show.comment: Show refer a friend link in user account.

referral_points.label: Referral points or ratio
referral_points.comment: Points earned when referred friend orders.

referral_points_method.label: Calculation type (referral points)
referral_points_method.comment: Calculation type used. "Cart summary Ratio points" multiplies cart subtotal by inserted value, "Ratio points" uses inserted value to calculate points and "static value" uses configuration value without any calculation. Note that any configured rules or points on product page will override Ratio points calculation.

referral_child_points.label: Referral child points or ratio
referral_child_points.comment: Points earned by referred friend for first order.

referral_child_points_method.label: Calculation type (child points)
referral_child_points_method.comment: Calculation type used. "Cart summary Ratio points" multiplies cart subtotal by inserted value, "Ratio points" uses inserted value to calculate points and "static value" uses configuration value without any calculation. Note that any configured rules or points on product page will override Ratio points calculation.

referral_min_order.label: Referral min. order
referral_min_order.comment: Referral minimum order amount (base subtotal amount without shipping fees) in order to process referral actions (0 for no minimum amount).

referral_permanent.label: Show referral permanent link
referral_permanent.comment: This will allow customers to share permanent their permanent link to refer friends.

referral_redirection.label: Referral Redirection
referral_redirection.comment: Redirection path for permanent link, excluding domain name and index.php/ part (e.g. electronics/cell-phones.html). Leave blank to use default redirection.

referral_addthis.label: Share with addthis
referral_addthis.comment: Allow customers to share permanent link using addthis. Visit addthis.com to create an account.

referral_addthis_code.label: addthis code
referral_addthis_code.comment: Addthis buttons code without javascript element.

referral_custom_code.label: Custom Social Share Code
referral_custom_code.comment: Custom social share code. You can integrate any other social network sharing tool (such as jiathis, sharethis, addinto, etc.) in order to share referral url. Referral url must be integrated to the code with the following: {{referral_url}}

referrer_registration_points.label: Referrer Registration points
referrer_registration_points.comment: Extra points earned by referrer customer upon referred friend registration (points are allocated when customer logs into the system for the first time).

referred_registration_points.label: Referred Registration points
referred_registration_points.comment: Extra points earned by referred customer upon registration (points are allocated when customer logs into the system for the first time).

subscription_email_identity.label: Subscription email identity
subscription_email_identity.comment: Referral email idendity used while sending referral requests.

referral_guestallow.label: Disable guest orders
referral_guestallow.comment: Disable guest orders when customer orders from referral url/email.

referral_side.label: Show Extra box
referral_side.comment: Show referral boxes on side areas of your store. Allow to show permanent link and custom code but excludes addthis.

other_points.label: Other point allocation
other_points.comment: Other point allocation such as product review points, newsletter points, polls points are available from this section.

review_points.label: Points per validated review
review_points.comment: Points the customer get while sending a valid review.

show_review_points.label: Show review point sentence
show_review_points.comment: If set to yes, review point sentence is shown under review urls on product view pages.

newsletter_points.label: Newsletter points
newsletter_points.comment: Newsletter points. Give points when user registers to newsletter (unsubscribing doesn't remove points).

show_newsletter_points.label: Show newsletter sentence (account creation)
show_newsletter_points.comment: If set to yes, newsletter point sentence is shown on top of account creation form (detault magento theme).

show_poll_points.label: Show poll point sentence
show_poll_points.comment: If set to yes, poll point sentence is shown within poll sideboxes.

tag_points.label: Tag points
tag_points.comment: Points collected for any new valid customer tag.

show_tag_points.label: Show tag point sentence
show_tag_points.comment: If set to yes, tag point sentence is shown within tag form (product.tag.list.list.before block alias must be loaded within your layout.).

referral_steps.label: Referral Steps
referral_steps.comment: Min/Max valid orders' quantity values for referrer and referred friends while collecting points. Dates are optionnal and 0 can be used as min/max values as no values. Note that no re-calculations are available for advanced referral points' allocation. Important: only valid orders (defined as above configuration) are processed and order can be processed more than once.

dataflow_profile.label: Import profile
dataflow_profile.comment: Exports are available from 'Default config store' scope and Import is available from website scope. No referral points nor validation dates are imported.

field_points.label: Points
field_points.comment: Used for import file configuration. Negative values may be used for used points.

field_order.label: Order Reference
field_order.comment: Used for import file configuration. This is the incremented order reference. This field is not a mandatory field (default value will be admin gift). Use -1 for admin gift.

field_store.label: Store Ids
field_store.comment: Used for import file configuration. This field is not a mandatory field (store ids of current website scope will be used). For multiple values, separate with comma.

notifications.label: Expiry Email notifications
notifications.comment: Notify customers by email when points are reaching expiry date.

notification_days.label: Number of days before points expiring

status_notification.label: Email point status notification
status_notification.comment: Sends email notifications according to rules.

points_notifications.label: Customer Point status Notifications
points_notifications.comment: Setup point value used to notify customers of their accumuated point value. Min and Max value must be defined. Duration is the gap in days between two same customer's notifications.

admin_notifications.label: Admin Email notifications
admin_notifications.comment: Customer points notifications through admin area.

notification_admin_email_template.label: Email sent through admin points adding

top_cart_messages.label: Cart Rule Messages
top_cart_messages.comment: Reward Points Cart Rule Messages shown on cart page.

show_information.label: Show information
show_information.comment: Show point details on product page.

block_default.label: Default block name
block_default.comment: Default layout block name where the rule messages will be injected (default is: global_messages). Other block name could be checkout.cart.form.before for example.

message_duration.label: Duration between messages
message_duration.comment: Duration in seconds between each messages (default is: 2000).

design.label: Design and Graphics
design.comment: Setup graphic design of the module.

small_inline_image_show.label: Show small image
small_inline_image_show.comment: Show small inline image on product views.

small_inline_image.label: Small inline image
small_inline_image.comment: Allowed file types: jpeg, gif, png.

small_inline_image_size.label: Small inline image size
small_inline_image_size.comment: Define the small inline image size. The value inserted will be used as: value x value.

big_inline_image_show.label: Show big image
big_inline_image_show.comment: Show big image on shopping cart area.

big_inline_image.label: Big inline image
big_inline_image.comment: Allowed file types: jpeg, gif, png.

big_inline_image_size.label: Big inline image size
big_inline_image_size.comment: Define the big inline image size. The value inserted will be used as: value x value.

product_page.label: Product point information
product_page.comment: Details on product page regarding points customer collects.

cms_page.label: CMS page identifier
cms_page.comment: CMS Page identifier where your customer will find information about the point details (page created by you, explaining details regarding the point scheme on your site). 'About' link will appear on product pages. Leave blank for no links.

show_information.label: Show information
show_information.comment: Show point details on product page.

duplicate_text_product_page.label: Duplicate text on top
duplicate_text_product_page.comment: Duplicate text on top of product page (only when product have options with price on top and price on bottom of the page).

block_default.label: Default block name
block_default.comment: Default layout block name where the point details will be injected (default is: product.info.addtocart).

block_extra.label: Extra block name
block_extra.comment: Layout block name where duplicated point details will be injected (default is: product.info.configurable).

show_list_points.label: Show list points
show_list_points.comment: Show point details on product list page. Depending on your theme, you may need to set this value to no and modify your theme according to explanations available on installation procedures.

admin_dashboard.label: Admin Dashboard
admin_dashboard.comment: Point dashboard on admin area page.

show_dashboard.label: Show information
show_dashboard.comment: Show point dashboard area within admin.

events.label: Event Observers
events.comment: Specify custom event triggering point actions.

event_list.label: Event List
event_list.comment: List of event defined by: observed magento class name, point value, type of process, maximum point allocation (0 for no value), duration in days between two insertions (0 for no value). Customer needs to be logged in order to collect customer details. Id verification constraint insertion of points only for different model ids for same customer (same inserted model id will be rejected). Validity duration refers to the points validity duration in days (use 0 for unlimited). Verifications allow you to use object variables and their values as condition (defined as variable_name|variable_expected_value. If many verifications, separate them by ';') for point allocation (e.g. group_id|1;active|1 will verify that the group id is 1 and active is 1).

show_on_order_admin.label: Show on admin orders
show_on_order_admin.comment: Show on order's viewing admin pages.

show_on_invoice_admin.label: Show on admin invoices
show_on_invoice_admin.comment: Show on invoice's viewing admin pages.

show_on_order_client.label: Show on client orders
show_on_order_client.comment: Show on order's viewing client pages.

show_on_invoice_client.label: Show on client invoices
show_on_invoice_client.comment: Show on invoice's viewing client pages.
